ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 18
ygData.msgSnippet: Check the list fool. You are being just plain stupid now.
ygData.messageBody:
Check the list fool. You are being just plain stupid now.

> ----------
> From: John Cuyle[SMTP:johncuyle@...]
> Reply To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Sent: Friday, April 23, 1999 9:41 AM
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Digest Number 18
>
> From: "John Cuyle" <johncuyle@...>
>
> Wow, in the last message you hated -pvp, now you hate +PvP. You are really
> beginning to look like an idiot. Since you are obviously just trolling, I
> think this will be my last message on this topic.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: McCartney, Michael R <Michael.McCartney2@...>
> To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
> Sent: Friday, April 23, 1999 7:02 AM
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Digest Number 18
>
>
> > From: "McCartney, Michael R" <Michael.McCartney2@...>
> >
> > Nope. I wont accept help from a +PvP. rather die. =)~
> > I dont think they have any business trying to blend with the -PvPs.
> ...also... so far.. in my clan... I've never been logged on for more
> than half an hour, and never had to play solo. I have solo'd... but always
> have to opportunity to group.
> >
> >
> > > ----------
> > > From: John Cuyle[SMTP:johncuyle@...]
> > > Reply To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> > > Sent: Thursday, April 22, 1999 5:55 PM
> > > To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> > > Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Digest Number 18
> > >
> > > From: "John Cuyle" <johncuyle@...>
> > >
> > > Heh, wait until the only one around is PvP. Might change your mind
> then.
> > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > From: McCartney, Michael R <Michael.McCartney2@...>
> > > To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
> > > Sent: Thursday, April 22, 1999 2:06 PM
> > > Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Digest Number 18
> > >
> > >
> > > > From: "McCartney, Michael R" <Michael.McCartney2@...>
> > > >
> > > > Na.. -PvPs can play fine by themselves. If they dont know how, then
> > > thats not a disadvantage due to +PvPs not helping them out, its due to a
> > > lack of knowledge. -PvPs dont need ANY help from +PvP... because
> any -PvP
> > > can do the same thing... which makes your argument pretty much
> meaningless.
>
>
